==Chinese==

===Etymology===
Probably borrowed from a language in Central Asia during the {{w|Han Dynasty}}. The ''{{w|Book of Han}}'':
: {{lang|zh|出封牛、水牛、象、大狗、沐猴、孔爵、珠璣、珊瑚、'''虎魄'''、璧流離。}}
:: ''(The country of [[:zh:w:罽賓|Jibin]] in the {{w|Western Regions}}) produces bison, buffalo, elephants, big dogs ([[:w:Kuchi (dog)|kuchis]]?), macaques, peacocks, jewels, corals, ambers and [[cat's eye]]s.''
